1- Create an account & get your Sapid re: 1- Create an account & get your Sapid ready. You can purchase your Sapid product from www.sapid.me
2. Start building your (Constants.appNam:
2. Start building your (Constants.appName) profile! 
Include a display picture, contact details and connect your desired social media accounts to your profile.
3. When you are done, you can go ahead a: 3. When you are done, you can go ahead and activate your Linkpod!
4. Share your profile instantly with jus:
4. Share your profile instantly with just one tap! Alternatively, you can share your profile link or QR code with the other party. 

Get connected today.

THIS VALUE CAN NOT BE EMPTY.
whatsappInstructions: Add your phone number including your country code (e.g. +33 743210012)
faceBookInstructions4: 4. Click on the Profile settings tab (three dots).
faceBookInstructions5: 5. Click on Copy Link to copy your full Facebook profile link.
faceBookInstructions6: 6. Paste the link into the Facebook URL field. (e.g. www.facebook.com/your_fb_id).
linkedinInstruction1: 1. Open your LinkedIn app and log into your account.
linkedinInstruction3: 3. Click on the three dots beside add section
linkedinInstruction6: 6. Paste the copied link into the LinkedIn URL field.
instagramInstruction1: 1. Open up your Instagram app and log into your account.
instagramInstruction2: 2. Click on your profile picture at the bottom right corner.
instagramInstruction3: 3. Your username will be shown at the very top of your profile (above your profile picture).
instagramInstruction4: 4. Paste your username into the Instagram URL field.
twitterInstruction1: Go to your Twitter profile (app or web) and your username is the one starting with @
twitterInstruction2: 2. Click on your profile picture located at the top left corner.
twitterInstruction3: 3. Your username will be shown under your profile picture.
twitterInstruction4: 4. Copy and paste your username into the Twitter URL field.
telegramInstruction1: 1. Open your Telegram app and log into your account.
telegramInstruction2: 2. Click on settings located at the bottom right corner.
telegramInstruction3: 3. Your username will be shown under your contact number.
telegramInstruction4: 4. Copy and paste your username into the Telegram URL field.
youtubeInstruction1: 1. Sign in to your YouTube Studio account.
youtubeInstruction2: 2. From the Menu, select Customisation Basic Info.
youtubeInstruction3: 3. Click into the Channel URL and copy the link.
youtubeInstruction4: 4. Paste the copied link into the YouTube URL field.
pinterestInstruction1: 1. Open your Pinterest app and log into your account.
pinterestInstruction2: 2. Click onto your profile picture located at the bottom right corner.
pinterestInstruction3: 3. Click into the three dots menu located at the top right corner.
pinterestInstruction5: 5. Paste the copied link into the Pinterest URL field.
snapchatInstruction1: 1. Open your Snapchat app and log into your account.
snapchatInstruction2: 2. Tap into your profile icon at the top left corner of the screen.
snapchatInstruction3: 3. Your username is shown next to your Snapchat score.
snapchatInstruction4: 4. Copy and paste the username into the Snapchat URL field.
tiktokInstruction1: 1. Open your TikTok app and log into your account.
tiktokInstruction2: 2. Click on profile located at the bottom right corner.
tiktokInstruction3: 3. Your username will be shown under your profile picture.
tiktokInstruction4: 4. Copy and paste your username into the TikTok URL field.
payPalInstruction1: 1. Go to www.paypal.com and log in.
payPalInstruction2: 2. Under your profile, select Get Paypal.me
payPalInstruction4: 4. Copy your created Paypal.me link and paste it into the Paypal URL field.
vimeoInstruction1: 1. Visit www.vimeo.com and log into your account.
vimeoInstruction3: 3. Go to your profile page and copy the Vimeo URL located at the bottom.
vimeoInstruction4: 4. Paste the copied link into the Vimeo URL field.
redditInstruction1: 1. Open your Reddit app and log into your account.
redditInstruction2: 2. Click on the top left corner profile icon.
redditInstruction3: 3. Copy the username under the profile avatar (e.g. u/username).
redditInstruction4: 4. Paste username into the Reddit URL field.

spotifyInstruction1: 1. Search for your favourite Artist or Albums.
spotifyInstruction2: 2. Click on the three dots menu selection and select share.
spotifyInstruction4: 4. Paste the copied link into the Spotify URL Field.
